content: sweet oddity art zero crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart sweet oddity art pattern licensed with disney copyright owned by disney for selling dolls of this pattern you will want to contact disney licensing sale of dolls for their copyright is not allowed without licensing you may not alter or sell pattern without my permission sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 7 inches from bottom to top of head with weight 4 yarn and a 3 25 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precisions when assembling the zero and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn worsted weight #4 approximately 100g of main color color a white color b orange color c red hook size d hook or 3 25 mm 21 mm safety eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing black embroidery thread blush optional abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet sl= slip_stitch double_crochet= double_crochet stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head and body crocheted from front of nose to back of head starting with color b 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 3 increase 5 single_crochet x 2= 14 4 single_crochet in each st around 5 5 single_crochet decrease x 2= 12 start stuffing the head as you work 6 decrease x 6= 6 change to color a 7 single_crochet in each st around 8 single_crochet increase x 3= 9 9 single_crochet in each st around 10 2 single_crochet increase x 3= 12 11 single_crochet in each st around 12 3 single_crochet increase x 3= 15 13 4 single_crochet increase x 3= 18 14 single_crochet in each st around 15 5 single_crochet increase x 3= 21 16 6 single_crochet increase x 3= 24 17 single_crochet in each st around 18 7 single_crochet increase x 3= 27 19 8 single_crochet increase x 3= 30 20 single_crochet in each st around 21 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet increase x 6 4 single_crochet= 36 22 2 single_crochet 4 single_crochet increase x 6 4 single_crochet= 42 23 2 single_crochet 5 single_crochet increase x 6 4 single_crochet= 48 24 2 single_crochet 6 single_crochet increase x 6 4 single_crochet= 54 25-29 single_crochet in each st around place eyes between row 21 and 22 leaving 11 holes between them 1st
